data.name: RPGScenery - Ship Scene
data.detailed_description:
The fate of the ship, which has gone through countless voyages, seems to be nearing its end. In the months since its departure, the supplies have been depleted, and the crew has permanently lost their enthusiasm. Only a miracle could help, or an unexpectedly emerging island on the horizon.

This DLC contains 8 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
data.about_the_game:
